channel.title: Please tell me
channel.description: Im currently working on luke1321s 530 source, but adding bh and etc and was wondering should I not code it? Because I do not know what kind of server people would like to play, please give me feed back of the source, what should be in it that people like etc..

item.title: Please tell me
item.dc:creator: @fakx fakx
item.description:
@fakx wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:6, topic:461744”][quote author=fakx link=topic=564693.msg4110150#msg4110150 date=1348436830]

[quote author=Ambokile link=topic=564693.msg4110143#msg4110143 date=1348436603]

Personally I like servers where you have to work for everything. Make bosses hard and skills rewarding.
[/quote] the server I’m planning to make is 530 Eco maybe running 546 cache, with bh craters bosses, etc but I have to know what people want first

I just told you what I want a functioning economy is more important than fancy minigames.
[/quote] soo, do u not mind if it is 530 or whatever graphics and do u mind claws and spirit shields ?

Make the item’s power relative to the rarity.

Also, players will join for the server rather than the graphics.[/quote]I’m not sure lol, I’m afraid I put so much time into coding this then I end up with 20 players

Read full topic

item.title: Please tell me
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“fakx, post:5, topic:461744”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=564693.msg4110143#msg4110143 date=1348436603]

[quote author=fakx link=topic=564693.msg4110131#msg4110131 date=1348436155]

Personally I like servers where you have to work for everything. Make bosses hard and skills rewarding.
[/quote] the server I’m planning to make is 530 Eco maybe running 546 cache, with bh craters bosses, etc but I have to know what people want first

I just told you what I want a functioning economy is more important than fancy minigames.
[/quote] soo, do u not mind if it is 530 or whatever graphics and do u mind claws and spirit shields ?[/quote]
Make the item’s power relative to the rarity.

Also, players will join for the server rather than the graphics.

Read full topic
